languages.text: "Все просто — три раунда, три выстрела. Кто окажется более метким стрелком, тот и победил. Вы начинаете".
"Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."
languages.original_text: "Все просто — три раунда, три выстрела. Кто окажется более метким стрелком, тот и победил. Вы начинаете".

traits.locale_text: "Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."
"Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."
"Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."
"Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."
"Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."

languages.text: 「シンプルにいきましょう。三ラウンドで、三発ずつ。命中率が高い方の勝ちです。お先にどうぞ」
languages.original_text: "Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."

traits.locale_text: 「シンプルにいきましょう。三ラウンドで、三発ずつ。命中率が高い方の勝ちです。お先にどうぞ」

languages.text: "Özel kurallar belirlemeye gerek yok. Üç tur, üç atış. Daha iyi atış yapan kazanır. İlk siz atış yapın."
languages.original_text: "Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."

traits.locale_text: "Özel kurallar belirlemeye gerek yok. Üç tur, üç atış. Daha iyi atış yapan kazanır. İlk siz atış yapın."

languages.text: «Que sea sencillo: tres rondas, tres disparos. El mejor gana. Puede empezar usted».
languages.original_text: "Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."

traits.locale_text: «Que sea sencillo: tres rondas, tres disparos. El mejor gana. Puede empezar usted».

languages.text: “规则很简单——三轮比赛，三发子弹，谁打中得更多谁就赢了。你先来吧。”
languages.original_text: "Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."

traits.locale_text: “规则很简单——三轮比赛，三发子弹，谁打中得更多谁就赢了。你先来吧。”

languages.text: « Allons au plus simple : trois manches, trois balles chacun. Le meilleur tir l'emporte. À vous l'honneur. »
languages.original_text: "Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."

traits.locale_text: « Allons au plus simple : trois manches, trois balles chacun. Le meilleur tir l'emporte. À vous l'honneur. »

languages.text: "Halten wir es einfach ... drei Runden, drei Schüsse. Der Bessere gewinnt. Ihr fangt an."
languages.original_text: "Let's keep it simple — three rounds, three shots. Whoever is the better shot wins. You go first."

traits.locale_text: "Halten wir es einfach ... drei Runden, drei Schüsse. Der Bessere gewinnt. Ihr fangt an."
